title: 1906: Villerville- Nanik et Monsieur Plantevigne (from "The Lartigue Portfolio" 1903-1916")
inscriptions: l.r. in ink on photograph: 683/5000U.S.; on mount in gold lettering: 1906- VILLERVILLE -/ NANIK ET MONSIEUR PLANTEVIGNE; l.c. blind stamped: [Lartique supervision stamp]; in ink on inside portfolio case: 683/ J.H.LARTIGUE [sun-like symbol]
